name: COURT WIZARD RETURNS
text:
COURT WIZARD RETURNS

Following a lengthy absence, Court Wizard Tarhiel returned to the Ebon Tower to continue his studies. The mage had previously disappeared soon after word of a breakthrough in his research reached the Bellman, prompting many to speculate on his whereabouts. When asked whatever befell him, the Wood Elf simply answered, "I don't want to talk about it."

MESSAGE FROM THE EDITOR

A previous issue of the Bellman erroneously listed the Court Wizard's race as Argonian.
